mods.name: Lengyu TP Device
description:
Allows you to teleport yourself anywhere you marked. 
1.Press NUM0 to mark the location. 
2.Press NUMdot to teleport.
3.Press NUM1-3 to switch within 3 slots.

It doesn't work in the map Digistruct Peak.
tagline: Allows you to teleport yourself anywhere you marked.

mods.name: Weapon Quick Switcher
description: Adds a keybind option to the game that allows you to switch to the last used weapon quickly. By default the key is binded to Q.
tagline: Press Q to quickly switch to the last used weapon.

mods.name: Simple Chinese Fix
description:
Fix several inexplicably invalid Simple Chinese Language localization words.
Lyuda = 鲁达
Minds Eye Skill = 灵犀之眼
tagline: Fix several Simple Chinese Language localization words.

mods.name: Shop Reseter
description: Adds a keybind option to the game that allows you to reset any shop you last used immediately. By default the key is binded to F9.
tagline: Adds a keybind that allows you to reset shop.

mods.name: Death Trap Memory Program
description:
Memory program for Death Trap. You can press the keybind(default: 6) to save the data of your equipped shield. Death Trap will always copy the shield you saved if it is in your backpack.
The Memory is persistent.
To erase the memory, you could remove your shield and press the keybind again..
tagline: Adds a keybind that allows Death Trap to memorize your shield.

mods.name: Loot Collector
description: Help you collect loot conveniently. 1.Press / to teleport all loot to you. These loot will form a circle around you and be sorted by rarity level. 2.Press - (on keypad) to delete all white and green loot. 3.Press Delete to delete all loot. (CAUTION) Mission Items and ECHO will be excluded.
tagline: Allows you to teleport all loot to you. These loot will form a circle around you and be sorted by rarity level.

mods.name: Throw Weapon Then Pickup
description:
Adds a keybind option to the game that allows you to throw your current weapon and then pick up it immediately. 
The benefit of doing this is: 
1.Switch weapon immediately. 2.Reloading magazine immediately.
By default the key is binded to H.
tagline: Adds a keybind that allows you to throw your current weapon and then pick up it immediately.
